title: I can't get in touch with support through my Pixel 3 XL
content:
I want to get in touch with the Pixel 3 support team and tried I follow the instructions on https://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/7109524?hl=en as I've done before. 

When I choose "Tips & support" in Settings, I just get a error message saying "Google Play services isn't responding". 

It has worked before and have no idea of what could be wrong or how I can get in contact with the support team through other channels.
